o:MethodTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_BusinessRule_AddExample
o:MethodTargetItem.a:Creator: WesselsH1
o:MethodTargetItem.a:MethodScript:
Sub %Method%(obj) WriteDebug "[mdde_BusinessRule_AddExample] " & obj.UOL
' Create a new example. Dim objNewExample : Set objNewExample = obj.GetExtendedCollection("mdde_BusinessRule_Examples").CreateNew() ' Enable name to code. objNewExample.SetNameToCode()
' Set the new example as the default example (so it's selected). obj.SetExtendedAttribute "mdde_BusinessRule_DefaultExample", objNewExample
Dim objAttribute For Each objAttribute In obj.Attributes Dim objExampleCollection : Set objExampleCollection = Nothing If objAttribute.HasStereotype("mdde_InputAttribute") Then Set objExampleCollection = objNewExample.GetExtendedCollection("mdde_ExampleInput") ElseIf objAttribute.HasStereotype("mdde_OutputAttribute") Then Set objExampleCollection = objNewExample.GetExtendedCollection("mdde_ExpectedScalarOutput") End If
' If the attribute target collection is found, create the example. If Not(objExampleCollection Is Nothing) Then Dim attributeExample : Set attributeExample = objExampleCollection.CreateNew() attributeExample.Name = objAttribute.Name attributeExample.Code = objAttribute.Code attributeExample.SetExtendedAttribute "mdde_Attribute", objAttribute End If Next
End Sub
